messages.body:
Evergy bid from NextEra made 'a long time ago,' and deal unlikely to materialize  $NEE $EVRG $DUK 

https://newsfilter.io/a/8b675f7553e1871f77348477e53e3daa

links.title: Evergy bid from NextEra made 'a long time ago,' and deal unlikely to materialize
links.description: CNBC's Faber in rattling off details about pending deals Tuesday, threw cold water on the late-breaking report yesterday that NextEra had made a bid for Evergy something that was true however, is highly unlikely a this point.The offer was made "a long time ago" perhaps even last May, and since then, NextEra sought to pursue Duke Energy.Executives were "surprised" by the story, Faber added, given how much time had passed and that the companies are not talking.That didn't prevent holder Elliott Management weighing in, encouraging Evergy earlier to "fully explore" the offer.

$NEE

$EVRG $NEE Evergy must 'fully explore' possible NextEra offer, Elliott says 

https://newsfilter.io/a/4f58ef57428d97dd91ef84ddd9aab464

links.title: Evergy must 'fully explore' possible NextEra offer, Elliott says
links.description: Activist investor Elliott Management calls on Evergy's board to "immediately re-engage with NextEra and fully explore the possibility of a transaction that maximizes value for Evergy's stakeholders," a day after Reuters reported Evergy had turned down a ~$15B all-stock offer for the company.NextEra is "positioned to deliver superior benefits for all of Evergy stakeholders, including providing lower electric rates for Evergy customers compared with what Evergy can achieve on a standalone basis," Elliott says.Elliott in January disclosed it had an economic interest of 11.3M shares in Evergy.

messages.body: $NEE - The alternative energy producer has offered $15 billion in stock to acquire Kansas City-based utility Evergy ($EVRG), according to people familiar with the matter who spoke to Reuters. NextEra – the world’s biggest solar and wind energy producer – was rebuffed and it is unclear whether it will make a new approach to Evergy.

$EVRG (+6.4% pre) Evergy (EVRG) Should Immediatly Reengage with NextEra $NEE - Elliott Management
